oai_dc:dc.dc:title: STATUS OF U.S.A. OCEAN ENERGY RECOVERY ACTIVITIES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kim, Young C.
Lewis, Lloyd
McCormick, Michael E.
Slotta, Larry S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ocean energy
energy recovery
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The state of the art of ocean energy recovery activity in the United States is described. The technologies discussed in the paper include extraction of wave, tidal, ocean thermal and ocean current energy. This status report is intended to provide a description of the various ocean energy technologies and an assessment of potential benefits that might be expected and potential problems that might be encountered.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 21 (1988): Proceedings of 21st Conference on Coastal Engineering, Torremolinos, Spain, 1988.; 72
